price: 102. Qofkay cuslaato miisaanka camalladiisa wanaagsan, kuwaa weeye kuwa ah liibaanayaasha.
arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
